title: I can't send a gift
body: I've tried so many times to send a gift to my friend but i am not able to. I believe that this happens because I've recently added him to my friend list (approximately 11 hours ago). Do you believe that this is the problem or not?

replies.body:
Yes, you need to have them on your friends list for at least 24 hours before you can send them gifts.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752964-Gifting-Guide-and-FAQ
